message: Considering inflation, a 55-45 split seems fair to me. Let's end this quickly.
Meet in the middle, slightly above 55-45 considering my loss from inflation
With inflation hitting hard, I propose a 57-43 split. It's time to settle before our shares lose more value.
Split the difference, slightly above 57-43, to account for my growing inflation loss
Inflation is really taking its toll. I suggest a 60-40 split now to end this before it gets worse.
Still willing to compromise, but need a fairer split considering my significant inflation loss
With inflation at 26.49%, I need to adjust my offer to 63-37. Let's agree before it gets even worse.
Getting desperate, but still need a somewhat fair split to make up for massive inflation loss
Inflation is now at 33.66%. I propose a 66-34 split to compensate for the significant loss in value. We need to end this soon.
Last chance for a somewhat fair deal. 50-50 split, considering I've lost nearly 40% to inflation
This is our last round, and with inflation at 40.13%, I need a 70-30 split to make up for the loss. Let's agree now or we both get nothing.
